body:
The Jaguar default shell is tcsh; you can put the C-shell commands  
in .tcshrc or .cshrc.  If you upgrade to Panther, use the Bourne shell  
commands.


Randolph


On Jan 2, 2009, at 1:25 PM, Kevin Kyte wrote:
